banner.title: OUR SOLUTIONS
banner.content: We are keen on working with partners who share our vision and passion to serve those most vulnerable. We are on a mission to end the water crisis. Through our partnerships, we have been able to implement more than 1000 projects to provide millions of people with access to clean water. Before implementing a project, we assess the community needs and circumstances, taking into consideration the communityâ€™s size, population, availability and quality of water sources,terrain and climate, in order to determine the best solutions and find the right technologies to supply safe drinking water in a cost-effective manner.

more_about_solutions.title: You can read more about the solutions we implement below 10:10 DONATE

list_content.title: WATER PURIFICATION STATION
list_content.content: We construct water purification stations to remove impurities from contaminated water sources. The purified water can then be used for drinking, cooking and irrigation.
